job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a talented and collaborative Full Stack Software Engineer to join our client's Create Team. In this role, you will work closely with a highly skilled team to drive the development of our document automation solutions. You will play a pivotal role in crafting scalable, high-quality software, contributing to both product discovery and delivery processes. This position allows you to influence the architecture and tools, and you'll have the opportunity to mentor team members. Success in this role requires a strong focus on customer value, excellent communication skills, and a passion for continuous improvement.
   Description
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with product goals.
     * Design, develop, and deploy scalable software components with an emphasis on high performance, security, and reliability.
     * Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality.
     * Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary.
     * Contribute to continuous improvement of development tools and processes, encouraging team innovation.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to enhance personal and team skill sets.
     * Work within an Agile framework, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and other team ceremonies.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer (Office Open XML

We are looking for a talented and collaborative Full Stack Software Engineer to join our client's Create Team. In this role, you will work closely with a highly skilled team to drive the development of our document automation solutions. You will play a pivotal role in crafting scalable, high-quality software, contributing to both product discovery and delivery processes. This position allows you to influence the architecture and tools, and you'll have the opportunity to mentor team members. Success in this role requires a strong focus on customer value, excellent communication skills, and a passion for continuous improvement.
   Description
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with product goals.
     * Design, develop, and deploy scalable software components with an emphasis on high performance, security, and reliability.
     * Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality.
     * Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary.
     * Contribute to continuous improvement of development tools and processes, encouraging team innovation.
     * Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends to enhance personal and team skill sets.
     * Work within an Agile framework, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and other team ceremonies.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on general software engineering tasks, collaboration, and continuous improvement within an Agile framework. While it mentions 'document automation solutions' and 'scalable, high-quality software', it lacks specific details about AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies that would align it with an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer profile. The emphasis is on traditional software development rather than AI-specific model building or deployment.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with product goals' directly indicates understanding and translating business needs.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to translate business requirements into technical solutions, ensuring alignment with product goals

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Design, develop, and deploy scalable software components with an emphasis on high performance, security, and reliability', 'Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality', and 'Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary' are all core activities of traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Design, develop, and deploy scalable software components with an emphasis on high performance, security, and reliability

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality' and 'Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary' are all core activities of traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Engage in code reviews and best practices to maintain a high standard of code quality

job_tasks.justification: The phrases 'Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary' are all core activities of traditional software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Identify and resolve software defects, conducting debugging and testing as necessary

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to continuous improvement of development tools and processes, encouraging team innovation' touches upon improving development workflows, which is a component of operations engineering, though not explicitly MLOps.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to continuous improvement of development tools and processes, encouraging team innovation

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'drive the development of our document automation solutions' implies working with data to automate documents, which can involve data processing and pipeline aspects, though not explicitly detailed.
job_tasks.phrase: drive the development of our document automation solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Work within an Agile framework, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and other team ceremonies' describes participation in software development methodologies.
job_tasks.phrase: Work within an Agile framework, participating in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, and other team ceremonies

soft_skills.phrase: Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry trends
Success in this role requires a strong focus on customer value
